name: Gorgon physiology
description:
As a gorgon you have several benefits and downsides:

(BENEFITS)
Firstly, you are resistant to all poisons and apply poison on hit.

Secondly, you have doubled healing from all sources (including natural regeneration)

Thirdly, you may turn a target to stone by looking at them

Lastly, you may enhance your healing abilities briefly.

(DOWNSIDES)
You cannot wear a helmet, you have increased hunger consumption, you cannot look at any glass and turn to stone during the day.
